reviewText: This is a great early 50's Police TV series,sought to expose con artists and swindlers and the sometimes brutal realities of police investigation. Great for Dragnet Fans and twice nominated for an Emmy award in this almost forgotten TV series. It's amust see on VHS or DVD!!!

This is a superb early 1950's Police series,one of the 1st to expose the brutal realities of crimianal investigation especially in trying to expose con men and swindlers. It was twice nominated for an emmy award, great for Dragnet Fans at a great price on DVD!!!
